abstract: Rachel Saltz reviews Bollywood comedy film My Friend Pinto, directed by Raaghav Dar and starring Prateik.
snippet: Prateik plays Michael Pinto, a Goan innocent who meets a host of Mumbai characters, in this Bollywood comedy.
lead_paragraph: Prateik plays Michael Pinto, a Goan innocent who meets a host of Mumbai characters, in this Bollywood comedy.

headline.main: An Innocent Who’s Adrift in Mumbai
headline.print_headline: An Innocent Who’s Adrift In Mumbai
headline.seo: ‘My Friend Pinto,’ Bollywood Comedy Starring Prateik — Review
